title: Profit of public sector banks expected to decline by 0.6 per cent QoQ : Motilal Oswal
description: Public sector banks are expected to see a slight quarterly dip in profits for Q2 FY25, with a 0.6% QoQ decline but a 17.2% YoY increase, according to Motilal Oswal. Private sector banks forecast modest growth, projecting a 12% YoY increase in Pre-Provision Operating Profit and 5% in PAT.
